title: Miuju 2024 : Maesil Liquor
description: Miuju is a fruit liqueur made with 2024 Goyang-grown plums. 'Miu' is the creator‚Äôs cat, and 'uju' reflects the endless inspiration she brings.

content.content: Miuju is not just a fruit liqueur ‚Äî it is a personal archive of time, craftsmanship, and sentiment. Created by a developer and musician, this project began with an intention to capture emotion in a bottle.

In May 2024, fresh green plums were handpicked in Goyang, Korea. Each plum was carefully cleaned and dried to prevent bruising. The base was created using a 1:1:1 ratio of plums, sugar, and refined soju, then sealed in a sterilized glass jar.

The mixture was aged undisturbed for one full year in a dark, cool environment. This slow infusion process gently extracted the natural essence of the plums ‚Äî yielding a deep, smooth profile without artificial intervention.

The bottle and label were designed to reflect the calm and intentional nature of the project. A limited run of bottles was custom-made at a local Korean glass workshop, and each label was designed and applied by hand by the creator.

The label features minimalist Korean typography and ink-inspired plum blossom motifs. It is printed on water-resistant material, and every bottle is individually labeled ‚Äî one by one. The total production run remains under 100 bottles.
The logo silhouette was inspired by the creator‚Äôs cat gazing out the window around the age of one. That calm, curious moment became the symbol of Miuju‚Äôs quiet elegance.
